name: Taka
description:
"Taka" by Arsalan Aboomohsenpour is now available on hic et Nunc.

"Taka" is a 60FPS video made out of algorithms and autonomous mathematical processes.

Generative Art is Art or design generated, composed, or constructed through computer software algorithms or similar mathematical or mechanical autonomous processes. The most common generative art forms are graphics that visually represent complex processes, music, or language-based compositions like poetry. Other applications include architectural design, models for understanding evolution, and artificial intelligence systems.
